I don't have a lot of formal Computer Science education, and I also don't have any Python programming experience. This class looked like a good way to get a little bit of both. My work as I went through the class can be found at:
https://github.com/SaintNicholas/MIT-OCW-6.00.

The course website, as well as some solutions for some of the exercises, can be found at the following 2 links.
http://ocw.mit.edu/courses/electrical-engineering-and-computer-science/6-00-introduction-to-computer-science-and-programming-fall-2008/index.htm
http://curiousreef.com/class/mit-opencourseware-600-introduction/
